# File.CopyFiles method

Copies the files.

```csharp
public static void CopyFiles(string sourceDirectory, string targetDirectory, string criterial, 
    bool overrides)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sourceDirectory | Source directory. |
| targetDirectory | Target directory. |
| criterial | File criteria. |
| overrides | if is true overrides destination file. |
